name: Dungeon Explorer Prototype (HeadCoach)
description:
This is an early prototype of a 3d Multiplayer Action-RPG game. Features include, Engaging Dungeons, Combat, Customizable Characters, Bosses, Items, Equipment, Loot, Treasure and Shops.

Currently features one repeatable dungeon.

Can be played as single-player or multiplayer. Local multiplayer works automatically, multiplayer over the net requires port forwarding by the host.
